featured.text: This is because many breakthroughs come up when people venture 20 their usual routines or areas of expertise.
A major breakthrough was the yellow light invented by a Detroit police officer William Potts.

definition.zh_def: 突破；重大的進展或發現
definition.en_def: A significant and dramatic advance or development, especially in knowledge or technology.
definition.example: The scientist made a breakthrough in cancer research.
